definitions: A plot of sequence similarities identified from word-matching or character comparison.
Use this concept for calculated substitution rates, relative site variability, data on sites with biased properties, highly conserved or very poorly conserved sites, regions, blocks etc.

label: Helical wheel
definitions: An image of peptide sequence sequence looking down the axis of the helix for highlighting amphipathicity and other properties.

label: Helical net
definitions: An image of peptide sequence sequence in a simple 3,4,3,4 repeating pattern that emulates at a simple level the arrangement of residues around an alpha helix.
Useful for highlighting amphipathicity and other properties.

label: Protein ionisation curve
definitions: A plot of pK versus pH for a protein.

label: Sequence composition plot
definitions: A plot of character or word composition / frequency of a molecular sequence.

label: Nucleic acid density plot
definitions: Density plot (of base composition) for a nucleotide sequence.

label: Sequence trace image
definitions: Image of a sequence trace (nucleotide sequence versus probabilities of each of the 4 bases).

label: FlyBase secondary identifier
definitions: Secondary identifier of an object from the FlyBase database.
Secondary identifier are used to handle entries that were merged with or split from other entries in the database.

label: Sequence checksum
definitions: A fixed-size datum calculated (by using a hash function) for a molecular sequence, typically for purposes of error detection or indexing.

label: Database entry metadata
definitions: Basic information on any arbitrary database entry.

label: Plasmid identifier
definitions: An identifier of a plasmid in a database.

label: Mutation ID
definitions: A unique identifier of a specific mutation catalogued in a database.

label: Codon number
definitions: The number of a codon, for instance, at which a mutation is located.

label: Database field name
definitions: The name of a field in a database.

label: Sequence cluster ID (SYSTERS)
definitions: Unique identifier of a sequence cluster from the SYSTERS database.

label: Ontology metadata
definitions: Data concerning a biological ontology.

label: Data resource definition name
definitions: The name of a data type.

label: OBO file format name
definitions: Name of an OBO file format such as OBO-XML, plain and so on.

label: Gene ID (MIPS)
definitions: Identifier for genetic elements in MIPS database.

label: EMBL accession
definitions: An accession number of an entry from the EMBL sequence database.

label: UniProt ID
definitions: An identifier of a polypeptide in the UniProt database.

label: GenBank accession
definitions: Accession number of an entry from the GenBank sequence database.

label: Gramene secondary identifier
definitions: Secondary (internal) identifier of a Gramene database entry.

label: Sequence variation ID
definitions: An identifier of an entry from a database of molecular sequence variation.

label: Gene ID
definitions: A unique (and typically persistent) identifier of a gene in a database, that is (typically) different to the gene name/symbol.

label: Gene ID (ECK)
definitions: Identifier of an E. coli K-12 gene from EcoGene Database.

label: Gene ID (HGNC)
definitions: Identifier for a gene approved by the HUGO Gene Nomenclature Committee.

label: Gene name
definitions: The name of a gene, (typically) assigned by a person and/or according to a naming scheme. It may contain white space characters and is typically more intuitive and readable than a gene symbol. It (typically) may be used to identify similar genes in different species and to derive a gene symbol.

label: SMILES string
definitions: A specification of a chemical structure in SMILES format.

label: STRING ID
definitions: Unique identifier of an entry from the STRING database of protein-protein interactions.

label: Reaction ID (SABIO-RK)
definitions: Identifier of a biological reaction from the SABIO-RK reactions database.

label: Carbohydrate report
definitions: Annotation on or information derived from one or more specific carbohydrate 3D structure(s).

label: GI number
definitions: A series of digits that are assigned consecutively to each sequence record processed by NCBI. The GI number bears no resemblance to the Accession number of the sequence record.

Nucleotide sequence GI number is shown in the VERSION field of the database record. Protein sequence GI number is shown in the CDS/db_xref field of a nucleotide database record, and the VERSION field of a protein database record.

label: NCBI version
definitions: An identifier assigned to sequence records processed by NCBI, made of the accession number of the database record followed by a dot and a version number.

Nucleotide sequence version contains two letters followed by six digits, a dot, and a version number (or for older nucleotide sequence records, the format is one letter followed by five digits, a dot, and a version number). Protein sequence version contains three letters followed by five digits, a dot, and a version number.

label: Cell line name
definitions: The name of a cell line.

label: Cell line name (exact)
definitions: The name of a cell line.

label: Cell line name (truncated)
definitions: The name of a cell line.

label: Cell line name (no punctuation)
definitions: The name of a cell line.

label: Cell line name (assonant)
definitions: The name of a cell line.

label: Enzyme ID
definitions: A unique, persistent identifier of an enzyme.

label: REBASE enzyme number
definitions: Identifier of an enzyme from the REBASE enzymes database.

label: DrugBank ID
definitions: Unique identifier of a drug from the DrugBank database.

label: GI number (protein)
definitions: A unique identifier assigned to NCBI protein sequence records.

Nucleotide sequence GI number is shown in the VERSION field of the database record. Protein sequence GI number is shown in the CDS/db_xref field of a nucleotide database record, and the VERSION field of a protein database record.

label: Bit score
definitions: A score derived from the alignment of two sequences, which is then normalised with respect to the scoring system.
Bit scores are normalised with respect to the scoring system and therefore can be used to compare alignment scores from different searches.

label: Resource metadata
definitions: Data concerning or describing some core computational resource, as distinct from primary data.  This includes metadata on the origin, source, history, ownership or location of some thing.
This is a broad data type and is used a placeholder for other, more specific types.

label: Ontology identifier
definitions: Any arbitrary identifier of an ontology.

label: Ontology concept name
definitions: The name of a concept in an ontology.

label: Genome build identifier
definitions: An identifier of a build of a particular genome.

label: Pathway or network name
definitions: The name of a biological pathway or network.

label: Pathway ID (KEGG)
definitions: Identifier of a pathway from the KEGG pathway database.

label: Pathway ID (NCI-Nature)
definitions: Identifier of a pathway from the NCI-Nature pathway database.

label: Pathway ID (ConsensusPathDB)
definitions: Identifier of a pathway from the ConsensusPathDB pathway database.

label: Sequence cluster ID (UniRef)
definitions: Unique identifier of an entry from the UniRef database.

label: Sequence cluster ID (UniRef100)
definitions: Unique identifier of an entry from the UniRef100 database.

label: Sequence cluster ID (UniRef90)
definitions: Unique identifier of an entry from the UniRef90 database.

label: Sequence cluster ID (UniRef50)
definitions: Unique identifier of an entry from the UniRef50 database.

label: Ontology data
definitions: Data concerning or derived from an ontology.
This is a broad data type and is used a placeholder for other, more specific types.

label: RNA family report
definitions: An informative report on a specific RNA family or other group of classified RNA sequences.

label: RNA family identifier
definitions: Identifier of an RNA family, typically an entry from a RNA sequence classification database.

label: RFAM accession
definitions: Stable accession number of an entry (RNA family) from the RFAM database.

label: Sequence accession (hybrid)
definitions: Accession number of a nucleotide or protein sequence database entry.

label: Pathway or network accession
definitions: A persistent, unique identifier of a biological pathway or network (typically a database entry).

label: Secondary structure alignment
definitions: Alignment of the (1D representations of) secondary structure of two or more molecules.

label: ASTD ID
definitions: Identifier of an object from the ASTD database.

label: ASTD ID (exon)
definitions: Identifier of an exon from the ASTD database.

label: ASTD ID (intron)
definitions: Identifier of an intron from the ASTD database.

label: ASTD ID (polya)
definitions: Identifier of a polyA signal from the ASTD database.

label: ASTD ID (tss)
definitions: Identifier of a transcription start site from the ASTD database.

label: Spot ID
definitions: Unique identifier of a spot from a two-dimensional (protein) gel.

label: Spot serial number
definitions: Unique identifier of a spot from a two-dimensional (protein) gel in the SWISS-2DPAGE database.

label: Spot ID (HSC-2DPAGE)
definitions: Unique identifier of a spot from a two-dimensional (protein) gel from a HSC-2DPAGE database.

label: Strain identifier
definitions: Identifier of a strain of an organism variant, typically a plant, virus or bacterium.

label: CABRI accession
definitions: A unique identifier of an item from the CABRI database.

label: Genotype experiment ID
definitions: Identifier of an entry from a database of genotype experiment metadata.

label: EGA accession
definitions: Identifier of an entry from the EGA database.

label: IPI protein ID
definitions: Identifier of a protein entry catalogued in the International Protein Index (IPI) database.

label: RefSeq accession (protein)
definitions: Accession number of a protein from the RefSeq database.

label: EPD ID
definitions: Identifier of an entry (promoter) from the EPD database.

label: TAIR accession
definitions: Identifier of an entry from the TAIR database.

label: TAIR accession (At gene)
definitions: Identifier of an Arabidopsis thaliana gene from the TAIR database.

label: UniSTS accession
definitions: Identifier of an entry from the UniSTS database.

label: UNITE accession
definitions: Identifier of an entry from the UNITE database.

label: UTR accession
definitions: Identifier of an entry from the UTR database.

label: UniParc accession
definitions: Accession number of a UniParc (protein sequence) database entry.

label: mFLJ/mKIAA number
definitions: Identifier of an entry from the Rouge or HUGE databases.

label: Ensembl protein ID
definitions: Unique identifier for a protein from the Ensembl database.

label: Phylogenetic data
definitions: Data concerning phylogeny, typically of molecular sequences, including reports of information concerning or derived from a phylogenetic tree, or from comparing two or more phylogenetic trees.
This is a broad data type and is used a placeholder for other, more specific types.

label: Text data
definitions: Data concerning, extracted from, or derived from the analysis of a scientific text (or texts) such as a full text article from a scientific journal.

This is a broad data type and is used a placeholder for other, more specific types.  It is primarily intended to help navigation of EDAM and would not typically be used for annotation. It includes concepts that are best described as scientific text or closely concerned with or derived from text.

label: Organism report
definitions: An informative report on a specific organism.

label: Experiment report
definitions: Annotation on a wet lab experiment, such as experimental conditions.

label: Sequence attribute
definitions: An attribute of a molecular sequence, possibly in reference to some other sequence.

label: Sequence tag profile
definitions: Output from a serial analysis of gene expression (SAGE), massively parallel signature sequencing (MPSS) or sequencing by synthesis (SBS) experiment.  In all cases this is a list of short sequence tags and the number of times it is observed.
This includes tag to gene assignments (tag mapping) of SAGE, MPSS and SBS data. Typically this is the sequencing-based expression profile annotated with gene identifiers.

SAGE, MPSS and SBS experiments are usually performed to study gene expression.  The sequence tags are typically subsequently annotated (after a database search) with the mRNA (and therefore gene) the tag was extracted from.

label: Mass spectrometry data
definitions: Data concerning a mass spectrometry measurement.

label: Protein structure raw data
definitions: Raw data from experimental methods for determining protein structure.
This is a broad data type and is used a placeholder for other, more specific types.  It is primarily intended to help navigation of EDAM and would not typically be used for annotation.

label: Mutation identifier
definitions: An identifier of a mutation.

label: Amino acid name (single letter)
definitions: Single letter amino acid identifier, e.g. G.

label: Amino acid name (three letter)
definitions: Three letter amino acid identifier, e.g. GLY.

label: Amino acid name (full name)
definitions: Full name of an amino acid, e.g. Glycine.

label: Toxin identifier
definitions: Identifier of a toxin.

label: ArachnoServer ID
definitions: Unique identifier of a toxin from the ArachnoServer database.

label: BindingDB Monomer ID
definitions: Unique identifier of a monomer from the BindingDB database.

label: GO concept ID (biological process)
definitions: An identifier of a 'biological process' concept from the the Gene Ontology.

label: GO concept ID (molecular function)
definitions: An identifier of a 'molecular function' concept from the the Gene Ontology.

label: Northern blot image
definitions: An image arising from a Northern Blot experiment.

label: Blot ID
definitions: Unique identifier of a blot from a Northern Blot.

label: BlotBase blot ID
definitions: Unique identifier of a blot from a Northern Blot from the BlotBase database.

label: Hierarchy
definitions: Raw data on a biological hierarchy, describing the hierarchy proper, hierarchy components and possibly associated annotation.

label: Brite hierarchy ID
definitions: Identifier of an entry from the Brite database of biological hierarchies.

label: BRENDA organism ID
definitions: A unique identifier for an organism used in the BRENDA database.

label: UniGene taxon
definitions: The name of a taxon using the controlled vocabulary of the UniGene database.

label: UTRdb taxon
definitions: The name of a taxon using the controlled vocabulary of the UTRdb database.

label: Catalogue ID
definitions: An identifier of a catalogue of biological resources.

label: CABRI catalogue name
definitions: The name of a catalogue of biological resources from the CABRI database.

label: Pathway or network
definitions: Primary data about a specific biological pathway or network (the nodes and connections within the pathway or network).

label: Gene expression data
definitions: Image, hybridisation or some other data arising from a study of gene expression, typically profiling or quantification.

label: Compound ID (KEGG)
definitions: Unique identifier of a chemical compound from the KEGG database.

label: RFAM name
definitions: Name (not necessarily stable) an entry (RNA family) from the RFAM database.

label: Reaction ID (KEGG)
definitions: Identifier of a biological reaction from the KEGG reactions database.

label: Drug ID (KEGG)
definitions: Unique identifier of a drug from the KEGG Drug database.

label: Ensembl ID
definitions: Identifier of an entry (exon, gene, transcript or protein) from the Ensembl database.

label: ICD identifier
definitions: An identifier of a disease from the International Classification of Diseases (ICD) database.

label: Sequence cluster ID (CluSTr)
definitions: Unique identifier of a sequence cluster from the CluSTr database.

label: KEGG Glycan ID
definitions: Unique identifier of a glycan ligand from the KEGG GLYCAN database (a subset of KEGG LIGAND).

label: TCDB ID
definitions: A unique identifier of a family from the transport classification database (TCDB) of membrane transport proteins.
OBO file for regular expression.

label: MINT ID
definitions: Unique identifier of an entry from the MINT database of protein-protein interactions.

label: DIP ID
definitions: Unique identifier of an entry from the DIP database of protein-protein interactions.

label: Signaling Gateway protein ID
definitions: Unique identifier of a protein listed in the UCSD-Nature Signaling Gateway Molecule Pages database.

label: Protein modification ID
definitions: Identifier of a protein modification catalogued in a database.

label: RESID ID
definitions: Identifier of a protein modification catalogued in the RESID database.

label: RGD ID
definitions: Identifier of an entry from the RGD database.

label: TAIR accession (protein)
definitions: Identifier of a protein sequence from the TAIR database.

label: Compound ID (HMDB)
definitions: Identifier of a small molecule metabolite from the Human Metabolome Database (HMDB).

label: LIPID MAPS ID
definitions: Identifier of an entry from the LIPID MAPS database.

label: PeptideAtlas ID
definitions: Identifier of a peptide from the PeptideAtlas peptide databases.

label: BioGRID interaction ID
definitions: A unique identifier of an interaction from the BioGRID database.

label: Enzyme ID (MEROPS)
definitions: Unique identifier of a peptidase enzyme from the MEROPS database.

label: Mobile genetic element ID
definitions: An identifier of a mobile genetic element.

label: ACLAME ID
definitions: An identifier of a mobile genetic element from the Aclame database.

label: SGD ID
definitions: Identifier of an entry from the Saccharomyces genome database (SGD).

label: Book ID
definitions: Unique identifier of a book.

label: ISBN
definitions: The International Standard Book Number (ISBN) is for identifying printed books.

label: Compound ID (3DMET)
definitions: Identifier of a metabolite from the 3DMET database.

label: MatrixDB interaction ID
definitions: A unique identifier of an interaction from the MatrixDB database.

label: cPath ID
definitions: A unique identifier for pathways, reactions, complexes and small molecules from the cPath (Pathway Commons) database.
These identifiers are unique within the cPath database, however, they are not stable between releases.

label: PubChem bioassay ID
definitions: Identifier of an assay from the PubChem database.

label: PubChem ID
definitions: Identifier of an entry from the PubChem database.

label: Reaction ID (MACie)
definitions: Identifier of an enzyme reaction mechanism from the MACie database.

label: Gene ID (miRBase)
definitions: Identifier for a gene from the miRBase database.

label: Gene ID (ZFIN)
definitions: Identifier for a gene from the Zebrafish information network genome (ZFIN) database.

label: Reaction ID (Rhea)
definitions: Identifier of an enzyme-catalysed reaction from the Rhea database.

label: Pathway ID (Unipathway)
definitions: Identifier of a biological pathway from the Unipathway database.

label: Compound ID (ChEMBL)
definitions: Identifier of a small molecular from the ChEMBL database.

label: LGICdb identifier
definitions: Unique identifier of an entry from the Ligand-gated ion channel (LGICdb) database.

label: Reaction kinetics ID (SABIO-RK)
definitions: Identifier of a biological reaction (kinetics entry) from the SABIO-RK reactions database.

label: PharmGKB ID
definitions: Identifier of an entry from the pharmacogenetics and pharmacogenomics knowledge base (PharmGKB).

label: Pathway ID (PharmGKB)
definitions: Identifier of a pathway from the pharmacogenetics and pharmacogenomics knowledge base (PharmGKB).

label: Disease ID (PharmGKB)
definitions: Identifier of a disease from the pharmacogenetics and pharmacogenomics knowledge base (PharmGKB).

label: Drug ID (PharmGKB)
definitions: Identifier of a drug from the pharmacogenetics and pharmacogenomics knowledge base (PharmGKB).

label: Drug ID (TTD)
definitions: Identifier of a drug from the Therapeutic Target Database (TTD).

label: Target ID (TTD)
definitions: Identifier of a target protein from the Therapeutic Target Database (TTD).

label: Cell type identifier
definitions: A unique identifier of a type or group of cells.

label: NeuronDB ID
definitions: A unique identifier of a neuron from the NeuronDB database.

label: NeuroMorpho ID
definitions: A unique identifier of a neuron from the NeuroMorpho database.

label: Compound ID (ChemIDplus)
definitions: Identifier of a chemical from the ChemIDplus database.

label: Pathway ID (SMPDB)
definitions: Identifier of a pathway from the Small Molecule Pathway Database (SMPDB).

label: BioNumbers ID
definitions: Identifier of an entry from the BioNumbers database of key numbers and associated data in molecular biology.

label: T3DB ID
definitions: Unique identifier of a toxin from the Toxin and Toxin Target Database (T3DB) database.

label: Carbohydrate identifier
definitions: Identifier of a carbohydrate.

label: GlycomeDB ID
definitions: Identifier of an entry from the GlycomeDB database.

label: LipidBank ID
definitions: Identifier of an entry from the LipidBank database.

label: CDD ID
definitions: Identifier of a conserved domain from the Conserved Domain Database.

label: MMDB ID
definitions: An identifier of an entry from the MMDB database.

label: iRefIndex ID
definitions: Unique identifier of an entry from the iRefIndex database of protein-protein interactions.

label: ModelDB ID
definitions: Unique identifier of an entry from the ModelDB database.

label: Pathway ID (DQCS)
definitions: Identifier of a signaling pathway from the Database of Quantitative Cellular Signaling (DQCS).

label: CATH identifier
definitions: Identifier of a protein domain (or other node) from the CATH database.

label: CATH node ID (family)
definitions: A code number identifying a family from the CATH database.

label: Enzyme ID (CAZy)
definitions: Identifier of an enzyme from the CAZy enzymes database.

label: Clone ID (IMAGE)
definitions: A unique identifier assigned by the I.M.A.G.E. consortium to a clone (cloned molecular sequence).

label: GO concept ID (cellular component)
definitions: An identifier of a 'cellular component' concept from the Gene Ontology.

label: Chromosome name (BioCyc)
definitions: Name of a chromosome as used in the BioCyc database.

label: CleanEx entry name
definitions: An identifier of a gene expression profile from the CleanEx database.

label: CleanEx dataset code
definitions: An identifier of (typically a list of) gene expression experiments catalogued in the CleanEx database.

label: Genome report
definitions: An informative report of general information concerning a genome as a whole.

label: Protein ID (CORUM)
definitions: Unique identifier for a protein complex from the CORUM database.

label: CDD PSSM-ID
definitions: Unique identifier of a position-specific scoring matrix from the CDD database.

label: Protein ID (CuticleDB)
definitions: Unique identifier for a protein from the CuticleDB database.

label: DBD ID
definitions: Identifier of a predicted transcription factor from the DBD database.

label: Oligonucleotide probe annotation
definitions: General annotation on an oligonucleotide probe, or a set of probes.

label: Oligonucleotide ID
definitions: Identifier of an oligonucleotide from a database.

label: dbProbe ID
definitions: Identifier of an oligonucleotide probe from the dbProbe database.

label: Dinucleotide property
definitions: Physicochemical property data for one or more dinucleotides.

label: DiProDB ID
definitions: Identifier of an dinucleotide property from the DiProDB database.

label: Protein ID (DisProt)
definitions: Unique identifier for a protein from the DisProt database.

label: Ensembl transcript ID
definitions: Unique identifier for a gene transcript from the Ensembl database.

label: Promoter ID
definitions: An identifier of a promoter of a gene that is catalogued in a database.

label: EST accession
definitions: Identifier of an EST sequence.

label: COGEME EST ID
definitions: Identifier of an EST sequence from the COGEME database.

label: COGEME unisequence ID
definitions: Identifier of a unisequence from the COGEME database.
A unisequence is a single sequence assembled from ESTs.

label: Protein family ID (GeneFarm)
definitions: Accession number of an entry (family) from the TIGRFam database.

label: Family name
definitions: The name of a family of organism.

label: Sequence feature ID (SwissRegulon)
definitions: A feature identifier as used in the SwissRegulon database.
This can be name of a gene, the ID of a TFBS, or genomic coordinates in form "chr:start..end".

label: FIG ID
definitions: A unique identifier of gene in the NMPDR database.
A FIG ID consists of four parts: a prefix, genome id, locus type and id number.

label: Gene ID (Xenbase)
definitions: A unique identifier of gene in the Xenbase database.

label: Gene ID (Genolist)
definitions: A unique identifier of gene in the Genolist database.

label: ABS ID
definitions: Identifier of an entry (promoter) from the ABS database.

label: AraC-XylS ID
definitions: Identifier of a transcription factor from the AraC-XylS database.

label: Locus ID (PseudoCAP)
definitions: Identifier of a locus from the PseudoCAP database.

label: Locus ID (UTR)
definitions: Identifier of a locus from the UTR database.

label: MonosaccharideDB ID
definitions: Unique identifier of a monosaccharide from the MonosaccharideDB database.

label: Genome identifier
definitions: An identifier of a particular genome.

label: GenomeReviews ID
definitions: An identifier of a particular genome.

label: GlycoMap ID
definitions: Identifier of an entry from the GlycosciencesDB database.

label: Carbohydrate conformational map
definitions: A conformational energy map of the glycosidic linkages in a carbohydrate molecule.

label: Transcription factor name
definitions: The name of a transcription factor.

label: TCID
definitions: Identifier of a membrane transport proteins from the transport classification database (TCDB).

label: Pfam domain name
definitions: Name of a domain from the Pfam database.

label: Pfam clan ID
definitions: Accession number of a Pfam clan.

label: Gene ID (VectorBase)
definitions: Identifier for a gene from the VectorBase database.

label: UTRSite ID
definitions: Identifier of an entry from the UTRSite database of regulatory motifs in eukaryotic UTRs.

label: Sequence signature report
definitions: An informative report about a specific or conserved pattern in a molecular sequence, such as its context in genes or proteins, its role, origin or method of construction, etc.

label: Protein name (UniProt)
definitions: Official name of a protein as used in the UniProt database.

label: HAMAP ID
definitions: Name of a protein family from the HAMAP database.

label: Transcript ID
definitions: Identifier of a RNA transcript.

label: HIT ID
definitions: Identifier of an RNA transcript from the H-InvDB database.

label: HIX ID
definitions: A unique identifier of gene cluster in the H-InvDB database.

label: HPA antibody id
definitions: Identifier of a antibody from the HPA database.

label: IMGT/HLA ID
definitions: Identifier of a human major histocompatibility complex (HLA) or other protein from the IMGT/HLA database.

label: Gene ID (JCVI)
definitions: A unique identifier of gene assigned by the J. Craig Venter Institute (JCVI).

label: Kinase name
definitions: The name of a kinase protein.

label: ConsensusPathDB entity ID
definitions: Identifier of a physical entity from the ConsensusPathDB database.

label: ConsensusPathDB entity name
definitions: Name of a physical entity from the ConsensusPathDB database.

label: CCAP strain number
definitions: The number of a strain of algae and protozoa from the CCAP database.

label: Stock number
definitions: An identifier of stock from a catalogue of biological resources.

label: Stock number (TAIR)
definitions: A stock number from The Arabidopsis information resource (TAIR).

label: REDIdb ID
definitions: Identifier of an entry from the RNA editing database (REDIdb).

label: SMART domain name
definitions: Name of a domain from the SMART database.

label: Protein family ID (PANTHER)
definitions: Accession number of an entry (family) from the PANTHER database.

label: RNAVirusDB ID
definitions: A unique identifier for a virus from the RNAVirusDB database.
Could list (or reference) other taxa here from https://www.phenoscape.org/wiki/Taxonomic_Rank_Vocabulary.

label: Virus ID
definitions: An accession of annotation on a (group of) viruses (catalogued in a database).

label: NCBI Genome Project ID
definitions: An identifier of a genome project assigned by NCBI.

label: NCBI genome accession
definitions: A unique identifier of a whole genome assigned by the NCBI.

label: Protein ID (TopDB)
definitions: Unique identifier for a membrane protein from the TopDB database.

label: Gel ID
definitions: Identifier of a two-dimensional (protein) gel.

label: Reference map name (SWISS-2DPAGE)
definitions: Name of a reference map gel from the SWISS-2DPAGE database.

label: Protein ID (PeroxiBase)
definitions: Unique identifier for a peroxidase protein from the PeroxiBase database.

label: SISYPHUS ID
definitions: Identifier of an entry from the SISYPHUS database of tertiary structure alignments.

label: ORF ID
definitions: Accession of an open reading frame (catalogued in a database).

label: ORF identifier
definitions: An identifier of an open reading frame.

label: Linucs ID
definitions: Identifier of an entry from the GlycosciencesDB database.

label: Protein ID (LGICdb)
definitions: Unique identifier for a ligand-gated ion channel protein from the LGICdb database.

label: MaizeDB ID
definitions: Identifier of an EST sequence from the MaizeDB database.

label: Gene ID (MfunGD)
definitions: A unique identifier of gene in the MfunGD database.

label: Orpha number
definitions: An identifier of a disease from the Orpha database.

label: Protein ID (EcID)
definitions: Unique identifier for a protein from the EcID database.

label: Clone ID (RefSeq)
definitions: A unique identifier of a cDNA molecule catalogued in the RefSeq database.

label: Protein ID (ConoServer)
definitions: Unique identifier for a cone snail toxin protein from the ConoServer database.

label: GeneSNP ID
definitions: Identifier of a GeneSNP database entry.

label: Lipid identifier
definitions: Identifier of a lipid.

label: Gene ID (VBASE2)
definitions: Identifier for a gene from the VBASE2 database.

label: DPVweb ID
definitions: A unique identifier for a virus from the DPVweb database.

label: Pathway ID (BioSystems)
definitions: Identifier of a pathway from the BioSystems pathway database.

label: Abstract
definitions: An abstract of a scientific article.

label: Lipid structure
definitions: 3D coordinate and associated data for a lipid structure.

label: Drug structure
definitions: 3D coordinate and associated data for the (3D) structure of a drug.

label: Toxin structure
definitions: 3D coordinate and associated data for the (3D) structure of a toxin.

label: Position-specific scoring matrix
definitions: A simple matrix of numbers, where each value (or column of values) is derived derived from analysis of the corresponding position in a sequence alignment.

label: Distance matrix
definitions: A matrix of distances between molecular entities, where a value (distance) is (typically) derived from comparison of two entities and reflects their similarity.

label: Structural distance matrix
definitions: Distances (values representing similarity) between a group of molecular structures.

label: Ontology concept
definitions: A concept from a biological ontology.
This includes any fields from the concept definition such as concept name, definition, comments and so on.

label: Codon usage bias
definitions: A numerical measure of differences in the frequency of occurrence of synonymous codons in DNA sequences.

label: Radiation hybrid map
definitions: A map showing distance between genetic markers estimated by radiation-induced breaks in a chromosome.

The radiation method can break very closely linked markers providing a more detailed map.  Most genetic markers and subsequences may be located to a defined map position and with a more precise estimates of distance than a linkage map.

label: ID list
definitions: A simple list of data identifiers (such as database accessions), possibly with additional basic information on the addressed data.

label: Phylogenetic gene frequencies data
definitions: Gene frequencies data that may be read during phylogenetic tree calculation.

label: Protein complex
definitions: 3D coordinate and associated data for a multi-protein complex; two or more polypeptides chains in a stable, functional association with one another.

label: Protein structural motif
definitions: 3D coordinate and associated data for a protein (3D) structural motif; any group of contiguous or non-contiguous amino acid residues but typically those forming a feature with a structural or functional role.

label: Lipid report
definitions: Annotation on or information derived from one or more specific lipid 3D structure(s).

label: Plot
definitions: Biological data that has been plotted as a graph of some type.

label: Protein sequence record
definitions: A protein sequence and associated metadata.

label: Nucleic acid sequence record
definitions: A nucleic acid sequence and associated metadata.

label: Biological model accession
definitions: Accession of a mathematical model, typically an entry from a database.

label: Cell type name
definitions: The name of a type or group of cells.

label: Cell type accession
definitions: Accession of a type or group of cells (catalogued in a database).

label: Compound accession
definitions: Accession of an entry from a database of chemicals.

label: Drug accession
definitions: Accession of a drug.

label: Toxin name
definitions: Name of a toxin.

label: Toxin accession
definitions: Accession of a toxin (catalogued in a database).

label: Monosaccharide accession
definitions: Accession of a monosaccharide (catalogued in a database).

label: Drug name
definitions: Common name of a drug.

label: Carbohydrate accession
definitions: Accession of an entry from a database of carbohydrates.

label: Molecule accession
definitions: Accession of a specific molecule (catalogued in a database).

label: Data resource definition accession
definitions: Accession of a data definition (catalogued in a database).

label: Genome accession
definitions: An accession of a particular genome (in a database).

label: Map accession
definitions: An accession of a map of a molecular sequence (deposited in a database).

label: Lipid accession
definitions: Accession of an entry from a database of lipids.

label: Peptide ID
definitions: Accession of a peptide deposited in a database.

label: Protein accession
definitions: Accession of a protein deposited in a database.

label: Organism accession
definitions: An accession of annotation on a (group of) organisms (catalogued in a database).

label: Organism name
definitions: The name of an organism (or group of organisms).

label: Protein family accession
definitions: Accession of a protein family (that is deposited in a database).

label: Transcription factor accession
definitions: Accession of an entry from a database of transcription factors or binding sites.

label: Strain accession
definitions: Identifier of a strain of an organism variant, typically a plant, virus or bacterium.

label: Virus identifier
definitions: An accession of annotation on a (group of) viruses (catalogued in a database).

label: Sequence features metadata
definitions: Metadata on sequence features.

label: Gramene identifier
definitions: Identifier of a Gramene database entry.

label: DDBJ accession
definitions: An identifier of an entry from the DDBJ sequence database.

label: ConsensusPathDB identifier
definitions: An identifier of an entity from the ConsensusPathDB database.

label: Sequence report
definitions: An informative report of information about molecular sequence(s), including basic information (metadata), and reports generated from molecular sequence analysis, including positional features and non-positional properties.

label: Protein secondary structure report
definitions: An informative report about the properties or features of one or more protein secondary structures.

label: Hopp and Woods plot
definitions: A Hopp and Woods plot of predicted antigenicity of a peptide or protein.

label: Nucleic acid melting curve
definitions: A melting curve of a double-stranded nucleic acid molecule (DNA or DNA/RNA).
Shows the proportion of nucleic acid which are double-stranded versus temperature.

label: Nucleic acid probability profile
definitions: A probability profile of a double-stranded nucleic acid molecule (DNA or DNA/RNA).
Shows the probability of a base pair not being melted (i.e. remaining as double-stranded DNA) at a specified temperature

label: Nucleic acid temperature profile
definitions: A temperature profile of a double-stranded nucleic acid molecule (DNA or DNA/RNA).
Plots melting temperature versus base position.

label: Image
definitions: Biological or biomedical data has been rendered into an image, typically for display on screen.

label: Sequence image
definitions: Image of a molecular sequence, possibly with sequence features or properties shown.

label: Protein hydropathy data
definitions: A report on protein properties concerning hydropathy.

label: Protein sequence (raw)
definitions: A raw protein sequence (string of characters).

label: Nucleic acid sequence (raw)
definitions: A raw nucleic acid sequence.

label: Protein sequence
definitions: One or more protein sequences, possibly with associated annotation.

label: Nucleic acid sequence
definitions: One or more nucleic acid sequences, possibly with associated annotation.

label: Reaction data
definitions: Data concerning a biochemical reaction, typically data and more general annotation on the kinetics of enzyme-catalysed reaction.
This is a broad data type and is used a placeholder for other, more specific types.

label: Peptide property
definitions: Data concerning small peptides.

label: Pathway or network report
definitions: An informative report concerning or derived from the analysis of a biological pathway or network, such as a map (diagram) or annotation.

label: Nucleic acid thermodynamic data
definitions: A thermodynamic or kinetic property of a nucleic acid molecule.

label: Protein geometry report
definitions: Geometry data for a protein structure, for example bond lengths, bond angles, torsion angles, chiralities, planaraties etc.

label: Protein structure image
definitions: An image of protein structure.

label: Phylogenetic character weights
definitions: Weights for sequence positions or characters in phylogenetic analysis where zero is defined as unweighted.

label: Annotation track
definitions: Annotation of one particular positional feature on a biomolecular (typically genome) sequence, suitable for import and display in a genome browser.

label: UniProt accession
definitions: Accession number of a UniProt (protein sequence) database entry.

label: NCBI genetic code ID
definitions: Identifier of a genetic code in the NCBI list of genetic codes.

label: Ontology concept identifier
definitions: Identifier of a concept in an ontology of biological or bioinformatics concepts and relations.

label: Taxonomy
definitions: Data concerning the classification, identification and naming of organisms.
This is a broad data type and is used a placeholder for other, more specific types.

label: Protein ID (EMBL/GenBank/DDBJ)
definitions: EMBL/GENBANK/DDBJ coding feature protein identifier, issued by International collaborators.

This qualifier consists of a stable ID portion (3+5 format with 3 position letters and 5 numbers) plus a version number after the decimal point. When the protein sequence encoded by the CDS changes, only the version number of the /protein_id value is incremented; the stable part of the /protein_id remains unchanged and as a result will permanently be associated with a given protein; this qualifier is valid only on CDS features which translate into a valid protein.

label: Sequence feature identifier
definitions: Name or other identifier of molecular sequence feature(s).

label: Structure identifier
definitions: An identifier of a molecular tertiary structure, typically an entry from a structure database.

label: Matrix identifier
definitions: An identifier of an array of numerical values, such as a comparison matrix.

label: CAS number
definitions: Unique numerical identifier of chemicals in the scientific literature, as assigned by the Chemical Abstracts Service.

label: ATC code
definitions: Unique identifier of a drug conforming to the Anatomical Therapeutic Chemical (ATC) Classification System, a drug classification system controlled by the WHO Collaborating Centre for Drug Statistics Methodology (WHOCC).

label: UNII
definitions: A unique, unambiguous, alphanumeric identifier of a chemical substance as catalogued by the Substance Registration System of the Food and Drug Administration (FDA).

label: System metadata
definitions: Metadata concerning the software, hardware or other aspects of a computer system.

label: Experimental measurement
definitions: Raw data such as measurements or other results from laboratory experiments, as generated from laboratory hardware.
This is a broad data type and is used a placeholder for other, more specific types. It is primarily intended to help navigation of EDAM and would not typically be used for annotation.

label: Raw microarray data
definitions: Raw data (typically MIAME-compliant) for hybridisations from a microarray experiment.
Such data as found in Affymetrix CEL or GPR files.

label: Processed microarray data
definitions: Data generated from processing and analysis of probe set data from a microarray experiment.
Such data as found in Affymetrix .CHP files or data from other software such as RMA or dChip.

label: Gene expression matrix
definitions: The final processed (normalised) data for a set of hybridisations in a microarray experiment.
This combines data from all hybridisations.

label: Sample annotation
definitions: Annotation on a biological sample, for example experimental factors and their values.
This might include compound and dose in a dose response experiment.

label: Microarray metadata
definitions: Annotation on the array itself used in a microarray experiment.
This might include gene identifiers, genomic coordinates, probe oligonucleotide sequences etc.

label: Microarray hybridisation data
definitions: Data concerning the hybridisations measured during a microarray experiment.

label: Nucleic acid structure report
definitions: A report on regions within a nucleic acid sequence which form secondary or tertiary (3D) structures.

label: Gene transcript report
definitions: An informative report on features of a messenger RNA (mRNA) molecules including precursor RNA, primary (unprocessed) transcript and fully processed molecules. This includes reports on a specific gene transcript, clone or EST.
This includes 5'untranslated region (5'UTR), coding sequences (CDS), exons, intervening sequences (intron) and 3'untranslated regions (3'UTR).

label: Gene family report
definitions: An informative report on a particular family of genes, typically a set of genes with similar sequence that originate from duplication of a common ancestor gene, or any other classification of nucleic acid sequences or structures that reflects gene structure.
This includes reports on on gene homologues between species.

label: Protein image
definitions: An image of a protein.

label: Protein alignment
definitions: An alignment of protein sequences and/or structures.

label: Sequence assembly report
definitions: An informative report about a DNA sequence assembly.

This might include an overall quality assement of the assembly and summary statistics including counts, average length and number of bases for reads, matches and non-matches, contigs, reads in pairs etc.

label: Genome index
definitions: An index of a genome sequence.
Many sequence alignment tasks involving many or very large sequences rely on a precomputed index of the sequence to accelerate the alignment.

label: Cytoband position
definitions: The position of a cytogenetic band in a genome.
Information might include start and end position in a chromosome sequence, chromosome identifier, name of band and so on.

label: Cell type ontology ID
definitions: Cell type ontology concept ID.

label: Kinetic model
definitions: Mathematical model of a network, that contains biochemical kinetics.

label: COSMIC ID
definitions: Identifier of a COSMIC database entry.

label: HGMD ID
definitions: Identifier of a HGMD database entry.

label: Sequence assembly ID
definitions: Unique identifier of sequence assembly.

label: Ensembl gene tree ID
definitions: Unique identifier for a gene tree from the Ensembl database.

label: Gene tree
definitions: A phylogenetic tree that is an estimate of the character's phylogeny.

label: Species tree
definitions: A phylogenetic tree that reflects phylogeny of the taxa from which the characters (used in calculating the tree) were sampled.

label: Sample ID
definitions: Name or other identifier of an entry from a biosample database.

label: MGI accession
definitions: Identifier of an object from the MGI database.

label: Phenotype name
definitions: Name of a phenotype.

label: Transition matrix
definitions: A HMM transition matrix contains the probabilities of switching from one HMM state to another.
Consider for example an HMM with two states (AT-rich and GC-rich).  The transition matrix will hold the probabilities of switching from the AT-rich to the GC-rich state, and vica versa.

label: Emission matrix
definitions: A HMM emission matrix holds the probabilities of choosing the four nucleotides (A, C, G and T) in each of the states of a HMM.

Consider for example an HMM with two states (AT-rich and GC-rich).  The emission matrix holds the probabilities of choosing each of the four nucleotides (A, C, G and T) in the AT-rich state and in the GC-rich state.

label: Format identifier
definitions: An identifier of a data format.

label: Raw image
definitions: Raw biological or biomedical image generated by some experimental technique.

label: Carbohydrate property
definitions: Data concerning the intrinsic physical (e.g. structural) or chemical properties of one, more or all carbohydrates.

label: MRI image
definitions: An imaging technique that uses magnetic fields and radiowaves to form images, typically to investigate the anatomy and physiology of the human body.

label: Cell migration track image
definitions: An image from a cell migration track assay.

label: Rate of association
definitions: Rate of association of a protein with another protein or some other molecule.

label: Gene order
definitions: Multiple gene identifiers in a specific order.
Such data are often used for genome rearrangement tools and phylogenetic tree labeling.

label: Spectrum
definitions: The spectrum of frequencies of electromagnetic radiation emitted from a molecule as a result of some spectroscopy experiment.

label: NMR spectrum
definitions: Spectral information for a molecule from a nuclear magnetic resonance experiment.

label: Chemical structure sketch
definitions: A sketch of a small molecule made with some specialised drawing package.
Chemical structure sketches are used for presentational purposes but also as inputs to various analysis software.

label: Nucleic acid signature
definitions: An informative report about a specific or conserved nucleic acid sequence pattern.

label: DNA sequence
definitions: A DNA sequence.

label: RNA sequence
definitions: An RNA sequence.

label: RNA sequence (raw)
definitions: A raw RNA sequence.

label: DNA sequence (raw)
definitions: A raw DNA sequence.

label: Sequence variations
definitions: Data on gene sequence variations resulting large-scale genotyping and DNA sequencing projects.
Variations are stored along with a reference genome.

label: Bibliography
definitions: A list of publications such as scientic papers or books.

label: Ontology mapping
definitions: A mapping of supplied textual terms or phrases to ontology concepts (URIs).

label: Image metadata
definitions: Any data concerning a specific biological or biomedical image.
This can include basic provenance and technical information about the image, scientific annotation and so on.

label: Clinical trial report
definitions: A report concerning a clinical trial.

label: Reference sample report
definitions: A report about a biosample.

label: Gene Expression Atlas Experiment ID
definitions: Accession number of an entry from the Gene Expression Atlas.

label: Disease identifier
definitions: Identifier of an entry from a database of disease.

label: Disease name
definitions: The name of some disease.

label: Training material
definitions: Some material that is used for educational (training) purposes.

label: Online course
definitions: A training course available for use on the Web.

label: Text
definitions: Any free or plain text, typically for human consumption and in English. Can instantiate also as a textual search query.

label: Biodiversity report
definitions: A report about biodiversity data.

label: Biosafety report
definitions: A report about biosafety data.

label: Isolation report
definitions: A report about any kind of isolation of biological material.

label: Pathogenicity report
definitions: Information about the ability of an organism to cause disease in a corresponding host.

label: Biosafety classification
definitions: Information about the biosafety classification of an organism according to corresponding law.

label: Geographic location
definitions: A report about localisation of the isolaton of biological material e.g. country or coordinates.

label: Isolation source
definitions: A report about any kind of isolation source of biological material e.g. blood, water, soil.

label: Physiology parameter
definitions: Experimentally determined parameter of the physiology of an organism, e.g. substrate spectrum.

label: Morphology parameter
definitions: Experimentally determined parameter of the morphology of an organism, e.g. size & shape.

label: Cultivation parameter
definitions: Experimental determined parameter for the cultivation of an organism.

label: Sequencing metadata name
definitions: Data concerning a sequencing experiment, that may be specified as an input to some tool.

label: Flow cell identifier
definitions: An identifier of a flow cell of a sequencing machine.
A flow cell is used to immobilise, amplify and sequence millions of molecules at once.  In Illumina machines, a flowcell is composed of  8 "lanes" which allows 8 experiments in a single analysis.

label: Lane identifier
definitions: An identifier of a lane within a flow cell of a sequencing machine, within which millions of sequences are immobilised, amplified and sequenced.

label: Run number
definitions: A number corresponding to the number of an analysis performed by a sequencing machine.  For example, if it's the 13th analysis, the run is 13.

label: Ecological data
definitions: Data concerning ecology; for example measurements and reports from the study of interactions among organisms and their environment.
This is a broad data type and is used a placeholder for other, more specific types.

label: Alpha diversity data
definitions: The mean species diversity in sites or habitats at a local scale.

label: Beta diversity data
definitions: The ratio between regional and local species diversity.

label: Gamma diversity data
definitions: The total species diversity in a landscape.

label: Ordination plot
definitions: A plot in which community data (e.g. species abundance data) is summarised.  Similar species and samples are plotted close together, and dissimilar species and samples are plotted placed far apart.

label: Over-representation report
definitions: An informative report containing a ranked list of categories (usually ontology concepts), each associated with a statistical metric of over-/under-representation within the studied data.

label: GO-term enrichment report
definitions: An informative report containing a ranked list of Gene Ontology concepts, each associated with a p-value, concerning or derived from the analysis of e.g. a set of genes or proteins.

label: Localisation score
definitions: Score for localization of one or more post-translational modifications in peptide sequence measured by mass spectrometry.

label: Unimod ID
definitions: Identifier of a protein modification catalogued in the Unimod database.

label: ProteomeXchange ID
definitions: Identifier for mass spectrometry proteomics data in the proteomexchange.org repository.

label: Clustered gene expression profiles
definitions: Groupings of gene expression profiles according to a clustering algorithm.

label: BRENDA ontology concept ID
definitions: An identifier of a concept from the BRENDA ontology.

label: Annotated text
definitions: A text (such as a scientific article), annotated with notes, data and metadata, such as recognised entities, concepts, and their relations.

label: Query script
definitions: A structured query, in form of a script, that defines a database search task.

label: 3D EM Map
definitions: Structural 3D model (volume map) from electron microscopy.

label: 3D EM Mask
definitions: Annotation on a structural 3D EM Map from electron microscopy. This might include one or several locations in the map of the known features of a particular macromolecule.

label: EM Movie
definitions: Raw DDD movie acquisition from electron microscopy.

label: EM Micrograph
definitions: Raw acquistion from electron microscopy or average of an aligned DDD movie.

label: SMILES
definitions: Chemical structure specified in Simplified Molecular Input Line Entry System (SMILES) line notation.

label: InChI
definitions: Chemical structure specified in IUPAC International Chemical Identifier (InChI) line notation.

label: mf
definitions: Chemical structure specified by Molecular Formula (MF), including a count of each element in a compound.
The general MF query format consists of a series of valid atomic symbols, with an optional number or range.

label: InChIKey
definitions: The InChIKey (hashed InChI) is a fixed length (25 character) condensed digital representation of an InChI chemical structure specification. It uniquely identifies a chemical compound.
An InChIKey identifier is not human- nor machine-readable but is more suitable for web searches than an InChI chemical structure specification.

label: smarts
definitions: SMILES ARbitrary Target Specification (SMARTS) format for chemical structure specification, which is a subset of the SMILES line notation.

label: unambiguous pure
definitions: Alphabet for a molecular sequence with possible unknown positions but without ambiguity or non-sequence characters.

label: nucleotide
definitions: Alphabet for a nucleotide sequence with possible ambiguity, unknown positions and non-sequence characters.
Non-sequence characters may be used for example for gaps.

label: protein
definitions: Alphabet for a protein sequence with possible ambiguity, unknown positions and non-sequence characters.
Non-sequence characters may be used for gaps and translation stop.

label: consensus
definitions: Alphabet for the consensus of two or more molecular sequences.

label: pure nucleotide
definitions: Alphabet for a nucleotide sequence with possible ambiguity and unknown positions but without non-sequence characters.

label: unambiguous pure nucleotide
definitions: Alphabet for a nucleotide sequence (characters ACGTU only) with possible unknown positions but without ambiguity or non-sequence characters .

label: dna
definitions: Alphabet for a DNA sequence with possible ambiguity, unknown positions and non-sequence characters.

label: rna
definitions: Alphabet for an RNA sequence with possible ambiguity, unknown positions and non-sequence characters.

label: unambiguous pure dna
definitions: Alphabet for a DNA sequence (characters ACGT only) with possible unknown positions but without ambiguity or non-sequence characters.

label: pure dna
definitions: Alphabet for a DNA sequence with possible ambiguity and unknown positions but without non-sequence characters.

label: unambiguous pure rna sequence
definitions: Alphabet for an RNA sequence (characters ACGU only) with possible unknown positions but without ambiguity or non-sequence characters.

label: pure rna
definitions: Alphabet for an RNA sequence with possible ambiguity and unknown positions but without non-sequence characters.

label: unambiguous pure protein
definitions: Alphabet for any protein sequence with possible unknown positions but without ambiguity or non-sequence characters.

label: pure protein
definitions: Alphabet for any protein sequence with possible ambiguity and unknown positions but without non-sequence characters.

label: EMBL feature location
definitions: Format for sequence positions (feature location) as used in DDBJ/EMBL/GenBank database.

label: quicktandem
definitions: Report format for tandem repeats in a nucleotide sequence (format generated by the Sanger Centre quicktandem program).

label: Sanger inverted repeats
definitions: Report format for inverted repeats in a nucleotide sequence (format generated by the Sanger Centre inverted program).

label: EMBOSS repeat
definitions: Report format for tandem repeats in a sequence (an EMBOSS report format).

label: est2genome format
definitions: Format of a report on exon-intron structure generated by EMBOSS est2genome.

label: restrict format
definitions: Report format for restriction enzyme recognition sites used by EMBOSS restrict program.

label: restover format
definitions: Report format for restriction enzyme recognition sites used by EMBOSS restover program.

label: REBASE restriction sites
definitions: Report format for restriction enzyme recognition sites used by REBASE database.

label: FASTA search results format
definitions: Format of results of a sequence database search using FASTA.
This includes (typically) score data, alignment data and a histogram (of observed and expected distribution of E values.)

label: BLAST results
definitions: Format of results of a sequence database search using some variant of BLAST.
This includes score data, alignment data and summary table.

label: mspcrunch
definitions: Format of results of a sequence database search using some variant of MSPCrunch.

label: Smith-Waterman format
definitions: Format of results of a sequence database search using some variant of Smith Waterman.

label: dhf
definitions: Format of EMBASSY domain hits file (DHF) of hits (sequences) with domain classification information.
The hits are relatives to a SCOP or CATH family and are found from a search of a sequence database.

label: lhf
definitions: Format of EMBASSY ligand hits file (LHF) of database hits (sequences) with ligand classification information.
The hits are putative ligand-binding sequences and are found from a search of a sequence database.

label: InterPro hits format
definitions: Results format for searches of the InterPro database.

label: InterPro protein view report format
definitions: Format of results of a search of the InterPro database showing matches of query protein sequence(s) to InterPro entries.
The report includes a classification of regions in a query protein sequence which are assigned to a known InterPro protein family or group.

label: InterPro match table format
definitions: Format of results of a search of the InterPro database showing matches between protein sequence(s) and signatures for an InterPro entry.

The table presents matches between query proteins (rows) and signature methods (columns) for this entry. Alternatively the sequence(s) might be from from the InterPro entry itself. The match position in the protein sequence and match status (true positive, false positive etc) are indicated.

label: HMMER Dirichlet prior
definitions: Dirichlet distribution HMMER format.

label: MEME Dirichlet prior
definitions: Dirichlet distribution MEME format.

label: HMMER emission and transition
definitions: Format of a report from the HMMER package on the emission and transition counts of a hidden Markov model.

label: prosite-pattern
definitions: Format of a regular expression pattern from the Prosite database.

label: EMBOSS sequence pattern
definitions: Format of an EMBOSS sequence pattern.

label: meme-motif
definitions: A motif in the format generated by the MEME program.

label: prosite-profile
definitions: Sequence profile (sequence classifier) format used in the PROSITE database.

label: JASPAR format
definitions: A profile (sequence classifier) in the format used in the JASPAR database.

label: MEME background Markov model
definitions: Format of the model of random sequences used by MEME.

label: HMMER format
definitions: Format of a hidden Markov model representation used by the HMMER package.

label: HMMER-aln
definitions: FASTA-style format for multiple sequences aligned by HMMER package to an HMM.

label: DIALIGN format
definitions: Format of multiple sequences aligned by DIALIGN package.

label: daf
definitions: EMBASSY 'domain alignment file' (DAF) format, containing a sequence alignment of protein domains belonging to the same SCOP or CATH family.
The format is clustal-like and includes annotation of domain family classification information.

label: Sequence-MEME profile alignment
definitions: Format for alignment of molecular sequences to MEME profiles (position-dependent scoring matrices) as generated by the MAST tool from the MEME package.

label: HMMER profile alignment (sequences versus HMMs)
definitions: Format used by the HMMER package for an alignment of a sequence against a hidden Markov model database.

label: HMMER profile alignment (HMM versus sequences)
definitions: Format used by the HMMER package for of an alignment of a hidden Markov model against a sequence database.

label: Phylip distance matrix
definitions: Format of PHYLIP phylogenetic distance matrix data.
Data Type must include the distance matrix, probably as pairs of sequence identifiers with a distance (integer or float).

label: ClustalW dendrogram
definitions: Dendrogram (tree file) format generated by ClustalW.

label: Phylip tree raw
definitions: Raw data file format used by Phylip from which a phylogenetic tree is directly generated or plotted.

label: Phylip continuous quantitative characters
definitions: PHYLIP file format for continuous quantitative character data.

label: Phylip character frequencies format
definitions: PHYLIP file format for phylogenetics character frequency data.

label: Phylip discrete states format
definitions: Format of PHYLIP discrete states data.

label: Phylip cliques format
definitions: Format of PHYLIP cliques data.

label: Phylip tree format
definitions: Phylogenetic tree data format used by the PHYLIP program.

label: TreeBASE format
definitions: The format of an entry from the TreeBASE database of phylogenetic data.

label: TreeFam format
definitions: The format of an entry from the TreeFam database of phylogenetic data.

label: Phylip tree distance format
definitions: Format for distances, such as Branch Score distance, between two or more phylogenetic trees as used by the Phylip package.

label: dssp
definitions: Format of an entry from the DSSP database (Dictionary of Secondary Structure in Proteins).
The DSSP database is built using the DSSP application which defines secondary structure, geometrical features and solvent exposure of proteins, given atomic coordinates in PDB format.

label: hssp
definitions: Entry format of the HSSP database (Homology-derived Secondary Structure in Proteins).

label: Dot-bracket format
definitions: Format of RNA secondary structure in dot-bracket notation, originally generated by the Vienna RNA package/server.

label: Vienna local RNA secondary structure format
definitions: Format of local RNA secondary structure components with free energy values, generated by the Vienna RNA package/server.

label: PDB database entry format
definitions: Format of an entry (or part of an entry) from the PDB database.

label: PDB
definitions: Entry format of PDB database in PDB format.

label: mmCIF
definitions: Entry format of PDB database in mmCIF format.

label: PDBML
definitions: Entry format of PDB database in PDBML (XML) format.

label: aaindex
definitions: Amino acid index format used by the AAindex database.

label: Pcons report format
definitions: Format of output of the Pcons Model Quality Assessment Program (MQAP).

Pcons ranks protein models by assessing their quality based on the occurrence of recurring common three-dimensional structural patterns. Pcons returns a score reflecting the overall global quality and a score for each individual residue in the protein reflecting the local residue quality.

label: ProQ report format
definitions: Format of output of the ProQ protein model quality predictor.
ProQ is a neural network-based predictor that predicts the quality of a protein model based on the number of structural features.

label: findkm
definitions: A report format for the kinetics of enzyme-catalysed reaction(s) in a format generated by EMBOSS findkm. This includes Michaelis Menten plot, Hanes Woolf plot, Michaelis Menten constant (Km) and maximum velocity (Vmax).

label: Primer3 primer
definitions: Report format on PCR primers and hybridisation oligos as generated by Whitehead primer3 program.

label: ABI
definitions: A format of raw sequence read data from an Applied Biosystems sequencing machine.

label: mira
definitions: Format of MIRA sequence trace information file.

label: CAF
definitions: Common Assembly Format (CAF). A sequence assembly format including contigs, base-call qualities, and other metadata.

label: EXP
definitions: Sequence assembly project file EXP format.

label: SCF
definitions: Staden Chromatogram Files format (SCF) of base-called sequence reads, qualities, and other metadata.

label: PHD
definitions: PHD sequence trace format to store serialised chromatogram data (reads).

label: dat
definitions: Format of Affymetrix data file of raw image data.

label: cel
definitions: Format of Affymetrix data file of information about (raw) expression levels of the individual probes.

label: affymetrix
definitions: Format of affymetrix gene cluster files (hc-genes.txt, hc-chips.txt) from hierarchical clustering.

label: affymetrix-exp
synonyms: Affymetrix experimental conditions data file format
definitions: Affymetrix data file format for information about experimental conditions and protocols.

label: CHP
definitions: Format of Affymetrix data file of information about (normalised) expression levels of the individual probes.

label: Taverna workflow format
definitions: Format of Taverna workflows.

label: HET group dictionary entry format
definitions: The format of an entry from the HET group dictionary (HET groups from PDB files).

label: PubMed citation
definitions: Format of bibliographic reference as used by the PubMed database.

label: Medline Display Format
definitions: Format for abstracts of scientific articles from the Medline database.
Bibliographic reference information including citation information is included

label: CiteXplore-core
definitions: CiteXplore 'core' citation format including title, journal, authors and abstract.

label: CiteXplore-all
definitions: CiteXplore 'all' citation format includes all known details such as Mesh terms and cross-references.

label: pmc
definitions: Article format of the PubMed Central database.

label: iHOP format
definitions: The format of iHOP (Information Hyperlinked over Proteins) text-mining result.

label: OSCAR format
definitions: OSCAR format of annotated chemical text.

OSCAR (Open-Source Chemistry Analysis Routines) software performs chemistry-specific parsing of chemical documents. It attempts to identify chemical names, ontology concepts, and chemical data from a document.

label: PlasMapper TextMap
definitions: Map of a plasmid (circular DNA) in PlasMapper TextMap format.

label: newick
definitions: Phylogenetic tree Newick (text) format.

label: TreeCon format
definitions: Phylogenetic tree TreeCon (text) format.

label: Nexus format
definitions: Phylogenetic tree Nexus (text) format.

label: Format
definitions: A defined way or layout of representing and structuring data in a computer file, blob, string, message, or elsewhere.

The main focus in EDAM lies on formats as means of structuring data exchanged between different tools or resources. The serialisation, compression, or encoding of concrete data formats/models is not in scope of EDAM. Format 'is format of' Data.

label: Sequence record format
definitions: Data format for a molecular sequence record.

label: Sequence feature annotation format
definitions: Data format for molecular sequence feature information.

label: Alignment format
definitions: Data format for molecular sequence alignment information.

label: acedb
definitions: ACEDB sequence format.

label: codata
definitions: Codata entry format.

label: dbid
definitions: Fasta format variant with database name before ID.

label: EMBL format
definitions: EMBL entry format.

label: Staden experiment format
definitions: Staden experiment file format.

label: FASTA
definitions: FASTA format including NCBI-style IDs.

label: FASTQ
definitions: FASTQ short read format ignoring quality scores.

label: FASTQ-illumina
definitions: FASTQ Illumina 1.3 short read format.

label: FASTQ-sanger
definitions: FASTQ short read format with phred quality.

label: FASTQ-solexa
definitions: FASTQ Solexa/Illumina 1.0 short read format.

label: fitch program
definitions: Fitch program format.

label: GCG
definitions: GCG sequence file format.
GCG SSF (single sequence file) file format.

label: GenBank format
definitions: Genbank entry format.

label: genpept
definitions: Genpept protein entry format.
Currently identical to refseqp format

label: GFF2-seq
definitions: GFF feature file format with sequence in the header.

label: GFF3-seq
definitions: GFF3 feature file format with sequence.

label: giFASTA format
definitions: FASTA sequence format including NCBI-style GIs.

label: hennig86
definitions: Hennig86 output sequence format.

label: ig
definitions: Intelligenetics sequence format.

label: igstrict
definitions: Intelligenetics sequence format (strict version).

label: jackknifer
definitions: Jackknifer interleaved and non-interleaved sequence format.

label: mase format
definitions: Mase program sequence format.

label: mega-seq
definitions: Mega interleaved and non-interleaved sequence format.

label: GCG MSF
definitions: GCG MSF (multiple sequence file) file format.

label: nbrf/pir
definitions: NBRF/PIR entry sequence format.

label: nexus-seq
definitions: Nexus/paup interleaved sequence format.

label: pdbatom

pdb format in EMBOSS.

label: pdbatomnuc
definitions: PDB nucleotide sequence format (ATOM lines).
pdbnuc format in EMBOSS.

label: pdbseqresnuc
definitions: PDB nucleotide sequence format (SEQRES lines).
pdbnucseq format in EMBOSS.

label: pdbseqres
definitions: PDB sequence format (SEQRES lines).
pdbseq format in EMBOSS.

label: Pearson format
definitions: Plain old FASTA sequence format (unspecified format for IDs).

label: raw
definitions: Raw sequence format with no non-sequence characters.

label: refseqp
definitions: Refseq protein entry sequence format.
Currently identical to genpept format

label: Staden format
definitions: Staden suite sequence format.

label: Stockholm format
definitions: Stockholm multiple sequence alignment format (used by Pfam and Rfam).

label: strider format
definitions: DNA strider output sequence format.

label: UniProtKB format
definitions: UniProtKB entry sequence format.

label: plain text format (unformatted)
definitions: Plain text sequence format (essentially unformatted).

label: ASN.1 sequence format
definitions: NCBI ASN.1-based sequence format.

label: DAS format
definitions: DAS sequence (XML) format (any type).

label: dasdna
definitions: DAS sequence (XML) format (nucleotide-only).
The use of this format is deprecated.

label: debug-seq
definitions: EMBOSS debugging trace sequence format of full internal data content.

label: jackknifernon
definitions: Jackknifer output sequence non-interleaved format.

label: NCBI format
definitions: NCBI FASTA sequence format with NCBI-style IDs.
There are several variants of this.

label: nexusnon
definitions: Nexus/paup non-interleaved sequence format.

label: GFF2
definitions: General Feature Format (GFF) of sequence features.

label: GFF3
definitions: Generic Feature Format version 3 (GFF3) of sequence features.

label: DASGFF
definitions: DAS GFF (XML) feature format.

label: debug-feat
definitions: EMBOSS debugging trace feature format of full internal data content.

label: ClustalW format
definitions: ClustalW format for (aligned) sequences.

label: debug
definitions: EMBOSS alignment format for debugging trace of full internal data content.

label: FASTA-aln
definitions: Fasta format for (aligned) sequences.

definitions: Pearson MARKX1 alignment format.

definitions: Pearson MARKX10 alignment format.

definitions: Pearson MARKX3 alignment format.

definitions: Alignment format for start and end of matches between sequence pairs.

label: mega
definitions: Mega format for (typically aligned) sequences.

label: meganon
definitions: Mega non-interleaved format for (typically aligned) sequences.

label: pair
definitions: EMBOSS simple sequence pair alignment format.

label: PHYLIP format
definitions: Phylip format for (aligned) sequences.

definitions: Phylip non-interleaved format for (aligned) sequences.

definitions: Alignment format for score values for pairs of sequences.

label: selex

definitions: EMBOSS simple multiple alignment format.

definitions: Simple multiple sequence (alignment) format for SRS.
